segments.text: This kitchen is disgusting; what a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's vomiting water all over the place, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is spreading like a filthy stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's ankle-deep in it, probably ruining her shoes without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled up, waiting to be contaminated by the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids? Filthy hands in the cookie jar, spreading crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that grimy stool, about to make more mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just standing there, begging for treats like a pest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets exposing all that dust and who knows what inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's dripping down the cabinet doorsâ€”utterly revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty window view can't hide this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really ought to clean this up before it's a health hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR
